snippet.title: Blackguards - Official Trailer - English
snippet.description:
What happens when the only hope of a threatened world lies not with heroes in shining armor, but in the hands of a band of misfits and criminals? Blackguards, a new turn-based strategy RPG, explores this very question. You will discover over 180 unique hex-based battlegrounds within a dark and mature story of crime, drugs, and murder. .


Please find more information about the game here:
http://store.steampowered.com/app/24965

If you want to try the game first please check the link for the demo down below:
http://www.blackguards-game.com/media/demo/

http://www.blackguards.com

www.daedalic.de/en
www.facebook.com/daedalic
